articles.title: CNN's Burnett to Arizona's Republican AG: Is it that hard to say?
articles.description: As the Trump administration continues to deny election results, CNN's Erin Burnett discusses where votes stand in Arizona, Georgia, Nevada and Pennsylvania.

articles.title: Magic wall: Biden's popular vote lead is highest margin in 20 years
articles.description: CNN's Phil Mattingly walks through where President Trump and President-elect Biden stand as the final votes are being counted in the 2020 presidential election.

articles.title: State Department is preventing Biden from accessing messages from foreign leaders
articles.description: A stack of messages from foreign leaders to President-elect Joe Biden are sitting at the State Department but the Trump administration is preventing him from accessing them, according to State Department officials familiar with the messages.

articles.title: Researchers tested 14 types of masks. Here's what they learned
articles.description: CNN's Brian Todd reports on new guidance from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention about masks and how they help prevent the spread of Covid-19.

articles.title: Why ex-CIA chief is more worried about Trump now
articles.description: Former CIA Director John Brennan tells CNN's Wolf Blitzer why he's more worried now than he has been during the past four years of President Trump's administration.

articles.author: Taylor Romine, CNN
articles.title: NY governor limits gatherings at private homes to 10 people, shares more restrictions after Covid-19 rise
articles.description: Indoor and outdoor gatherings in private homes in New York state will be limited to 10 people, Gov. Andrew Cuomo announced Wednesday.

articles.author: Elizabeth Cohen and Lauren Mascarenhas, CNN
articles.title: Moderna expects to know by the end of the month whether its Covid-19 vaccine works
articles.description: Moderna has finished accumulating data for a first analysis of its Covid-19 vaccine and expects to have an announcement on the vaccine's efficacy by the end of the month, the company said in a statement Wednesday.

articles.description: A passenger on SeaDream Yacht Club's SeaDream 1 got a preliminary positive test result for Covid-19 on Wednesday. It's the first Caribbean cruise since the pandemic started.

articles.title: Want $1 million? Just find some 'voter fraud'

articles.title: Joe Biden's win grows more decisive each day
See Georgia GOP senators hold mostly maskless rally
articles.description: As the race for Georgia's two US Senate seats heats up, Georgia's two Republican senators held an indoor, mostly maskless rally with Florida Republican Sen. Marco Rubio. CNN's Kyung Lah reports.
